text: Edgar Mandel (born 19 August 1928) is a German stage, film, and television actor who also appeared in audio plays. Born in Speyer, he took part in the 1957 world premiere of Bertold Brecht's Die Gesichte der Simone Machard at the Theater Frankfurt, staged by Harry Buckwitz. He was a member of the Theater Dortmund. == Filmography == Films with Mandel have included: * ' (1970)Wie eine Träne im Ozean Deutsches Filmhaus * ' (1979)Revolution in Frankfurt tvspielfilm.de/ == References == == External links == * * Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:German male film actors Category:20th-century German male actors
title: Edgar Mandel
